text: Michal Maier (born May 7, 1964) is a Czech sailor. He competed at five consecutive Summer Olympics in the Finn class: 1996 (14th position) 2000 (19th), 2004 (15th), 2008 (25th) and 2012 (21st). Maier was the oldest among Czech participants at the 2012 Olympics, with an age of at time of his closing race. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Czech male sailors (sport) Category:Olympic sailors of the Czech Republic Category:Sailors at the 1996 Summer Olympics – Finn Category:Sailors at the 2000 Summer Olympics – Finn Category:Sailors at the 2004 Summer Olympics – Finn Category:Sailors at the 2008 Summer Olympics – Finn Category:Sailors at the 2012 Summer Olympics – Finn
title: Michal Maier
